apple_vendor_description: This handshake emoji on Apple devices showcases two hands, depicted with medium-dark and dark skin tones respectively, clasped in a gesture of agreement and unity, all brought to life with Apple's characteristic realistic lighting. The smooth gradients and subtle shadows emphasize the connection and trust between individuals, reflecting Apple's inclusive design language. It's a powerful symbol of partnership, collaboration, and mutual respect conveyed through visually warm and inviting interactions on Apple devices.
